sourcesContent:
Omborlar jadvali

#ID Nomi Yaratilgan vaqti Oxirgi tahrirlangan vaqti Actions
{{item.id}} {{item.name}} {{item.addedDate | date:'MM/dd/YYYY h:mm a z'}} {{item.modifiedDate | date:'MM/dd/YYYY h:mm a z'}}
O'chirish

Rostdan ham o'chirmoqchimisiz?
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ToastrService } from 'ngx-toastr'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { Warehouse } from 'src/app/models/warehouse'; import { WarehouseService } from 'src/app/services/warehouse/warehouse.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-warehouse', templateUrl: './warehouse.component.html', styleUrls: ['./warehouse.component.css'] }) export class WarehouseComponent implements OnInit{ warehouses: Observable | undefined; constructor(private warehouseService: WarehouseService, private toastr: ToastrService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.warehouses = this.warehouseService.getAll(); } remove(id: number) { alert(id); //this.warehouseService.remove(id); window.location.reload(); } }
